description: Opportunity was finding a new world cup winner.Both side never win T-20 world cup.Nz scored 172 which looks enough to beat australia and win T-20 world cup final for the first time.but might australia win the game easily and prove their strength again

Ben stokes fighting and england win.Repeat 2 months ago world cup final.England won the match by 1 wicket.Ben stokes scored 135 not out.after falling 9th wicket england need 100 runs.ben stokes did it with jimmy anderson.Also poor fielding of Australia is ansother reason.

After 33 runs bangaldesh lost their 4 wickets.Bangladesh need 266 .Then sakib and riyad create a history.Their partnerships for 233 runs .Both scored 100 and make it history.Bangladesh win the match by 5 wickets

match: Sunrisers Hyderabad Vs Chennai Super Kings
description: Chennai defeated Hyderabad by 8 wickets to win their third IPL title.Sunrisers Hyderabad Scored 178 and as usual it was not enough in the mumbai.Faf du plessi gone early but it was not effect on chennai.A fantastic knock come from sahne Watson which give him man of the final
